channel.title: Git on Cory Code
channel.description: Recent content in Git on Cory Code

item.title: Git中常用的操作
item.description: Git中常用的操作 1. Remote Repo 1.1 Add Remote Repo $ git remote add origin git@github.com:huweim/repo_name.git 1.2 Delete Remote Repo Add a wrong remote repo, we could delete it. $ git remote -v origin git@github.com:huweim/huweim.github.io.git (fetch) origin git@github.com:huweim/huweim.github.io.git (push) Delete it $ git remote rm origin 1.3 Pull Origin Master to Local ❌似乎 push 之前如果有东西需
